original_text: Behold, when it was whole, it was meet for no work: how much less shall it be meet yet for any work, when the fire hath devoured it, and it is burned?
korean_text: 그것이 온전할 때에도 아무 제조에 합당하지 아니하였거든 하물며 불에 살라지고 탄 후에 어찌 제조에 합당하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: it was meet for no work
how much less shall it be meet yet for any work
when fire hath devoured it, and it is burned?
